title: paraakEla nanu
sahitya:
paraakEla nannu | paripaalimpa ||



muraari sOda- | ri amba ||



paraakEla... ||







anupallavi







niraadaraNa sE- | 



ya raadambaa neevu ||



paraashakti naa | 



muraalakimci ||



(paraakEla)







caraNam







dharaadyakhila muna- | 



ku raaNivainahari ||



haraa dula pogadu | 



paraatparee ||



durandha mahishaasura damani amba ||



samaraadinuDena shyaamakrushNanutE ||



(paraakEla)
